327709.「すごい……これが 種族神様たちの神気……。\n 身体中に チカラが みなぎって:
Amazing...so this is the divine power of a
race god... Power is flowing out of my whole
body!

327710.「神化の儀を 受けたときと同じ……\n すべてが 新しく 生まれ変わったみたいだ:
It's the same as the deification ritual...
I feel like everything's been born anew.

327711.「ええ……それに 感じます。\n 己が アストルティアとつながり\n ひとつに:
Yes... I can feel it. The sensation of
connecting with Astoltia, and becoming
one with her...

327712.「空も 海も 大地も……\n すべて わたくしたちの一部。これが\n 神として:
The sky, the sea, the earth... Everything is a
part of us. That is what it means to live as
gods.

327713.「すべて お前のおかげだ。\n この大恩に報いるには 足りないが……\n 俺たち:
And it's all thanks to you. This is not nearly enough to repay you for your incredible kindness, but... Here is a token of our
gratitude. Please take it.

327714.「私たちは アストルティアの柱となり……\n 世界を 支えていかなくては なりま:
To support the world...we must become the
pillars of Astoltia. It is a shame that we
have to part ways here.

327715.「だけど 忘れんなよ！ 姿が見えなくたって\n オレたちは お前といっしょだ！:
But don'tcha forget! Even if you can't see
us, we'll always be together!

327716.「わたくしの 大切なあなた……。\n 窮地に立たされることがあれば 名を呼んで。:
You are precious to me... If you ever find yourself in danger, you need only call my name. I will spread my wings and fly to your
side.

327717.<center>お前は お前の信じる道を\nまっすぐに 突き進め。\nさらばだ…:
Forge ahead on the path that you believe is
right.
Farewell, <cs_pchero>...my friend.

327718.「キミと 彼らの運命は\n 強い絆で 結ばれている。\n 近いうちに また会える:
Your destiny along with theirs is bound by a
strong bond. We'll meet them again soon...
I'm sure of it.

327720.「俺が お前を 間違えるもんか。\n お前は 俺の たったひとりの弟……\n 勇:
There's no way I'd mistake you.
My own and only brother...
You're Leone, the Hero.

327721.「やれやれ……最後まで\n 空気を 読まないヤツだな。\n こういうときは 黙っ:
Sheesh... You still can't read the room, can
you? At such an important time like this, it's
best to just walk away quietly.

327722.「あの日 お前に討たれ 俺は\n 消滅したはずだった。だが 意識だけが残り\n:
That day, when you defeated me...I should've
disappeared. But my consciousness remained,
drifting on as nothing more than dust...

327723.「そのまま 消えさるのを 静かに待ってたんだが\n 世界を救うチカラがほしいと:
I waited quietly to fade away, but someone's
voice stopped me. They cried about wanting
the power to save the world.

327724.「その声が あまりに うるさくて……\n まっすぐで 腹が立ってね。\n この世:
That voice was pretty loud, you know...
And it was so earnest, it made me furious.
I cursed the gods of this world.

327725.「自らを犠牲にして 世界を救った英雄に\n 何ひとつ 手を差しのべてやらないとは:
The gods are pretty cold-hearted to not offer
any help whatsoever to a champion who
sacrificed himself to save the world.

327726.「……で 俺が売ったケンカを エルドナ神が\n 買ってくれたおかげで 今に至るっ:
...Andーthanks to Eldona picking a fight with me after I ticked her offーhere we are. Getting turned into a Slime's probably
my punishment for mouthing off to her.

327727.「なんだよぉ そういうことは 早く言えって！\n なぁ お前も これから一緒に…:
What the... Why didn't you say so sooner?!
Come on, we'll go together, and...

327728.「悪いが 俺は ここまでだ。\n さっきの戦いで すべて 使い果たしちまった。\:
Sorry, but this is it for me. I used up
everything I had left in that battle.
Guess this is how I go, huh...

327729.「お前が……この世界を 守っていってくれ。\n 英雄神 アシュレイよ。:
You... Protect this world, got it?
Ashley, the champion god...

327730.「生まれてこなきゃよかったと ずっと思ってた。\n だけど 最後に お前の役に立:
I always wished that I was never born. But...
If I was of any use to you at all, then...
maybe my life had some meaning after all.

327731.「レオ……レオーネ！\n そんな……俺たちのために お前は……ッ！:
L...Leone!
No way... You did this, for us...!

327732.<center>ジア・クト念晶体を アストルティアに招き入れ\n世界を滅ぼさんと:
Leone...the sinner who invited the Dia Kut to
Astoltia and tried to destroy the world...
His sins can never, ever be forgiven.

327733.<center>ですが 友のため 自らのすべてを捧げた\n魂の高潔さは……まさし:
But his willingness to sacrifice himself for his friends, and his noble spirit...these are things worthy of a champion. I will not allow
him to disappear.

327734.<center>その星の名は レオーネ。\n生まれたばかりの 誰にも見つけられな:
The name of that star is "Leone".
A tiny, newborn star...so tiny, that none
will be able to find it.

327735.<center>ですが 確かに この世界に存在している。\nどうか あなたたちは:
But, his existence certainly lives on.
Please, you must remember himーthe
champion who became a shining star...
